description.en: Design of a 3D AR book for kids
description.es: Diseño de un libro 3D con realidad aumentada para niños
description.de: Design of a 3D AR book for kids

description.en: Creation of the first software development/distribution environment for drone; in order to encourage software development for these devices. We implemented a scenario in which two drones were controlled, coordinated, by a smartwatch
description.es: Creación del primer entorno de desarrollo software para drones. Una plataforma de desarrollo y distribución de aplicaciones para drones, que aporte un valor añadido al dispositivo. Implementamos un caso práctico en el que controlamos dos drones coordinados vía smartwatch.
description.de: Creation of the first software development/distribution environment for drone; in order to encourage software development for these devices. We implemented a scenario in which two drones were controlled, coordinated, by a smartwatch

description.en: Social platform for events/plans organisation with friends in an efficient and not-intrusive way
description.es: Plataforma social para organización de planes con amigos, de manera eficiente y no intrusiva
description.de: Social platform for events/plans organisation with friends in an efficient and not-intrusive way

iterations.award: 2º Position in first round (Poznan, Poland), classified to finals (Cork, Ireland)

description.en: Replacemante of the skip-ad button by a feedback button which skips the ad and provides user feedback about the ad. The goal is to implement a non-intrusive way of providing ad-feedback to improve the way advertisement is targeted to users
description.es: Sustitución del botón de saltar-anuncio por otro que además permita al usuario proporcionar feedback acerca de éste; con el objetivo de permitir a los sistemas de anuncios seleccionar su público potencial de manera eficaz y eficiente.
description.de: Replacemante of the skip-ad button by a feedback button which skips the ad and provides user feedback about the ad. The goal is to implement a non-intrusive way of providing ad-feedback to improve the way advertisement is targeted to users

description.en: Platform for organising/streaming in 360º Drone races. Implemented streaming, race logic and 360º drone pilot view.
description.es: Plataforma para la organización y streaming en 360º de carreras de drones. Se implementó el sistema de streaming, la lógica de circuitos y la vista de 360º de piloto
description.de: Platform for organising/streaming in 360º Drone races. Implemented streaming, race logic and 360º drone pilot view.

iterations.award: 2º Position and Honorable Mention to the project

description.en: AI System for Automatic Diagnosis via Possible Conflicts. Career Thesis which was presented as article to DX 14.
description.es: Sistema de AI para el diagnóstico automático vía Posibles Conflictos. Proyecto fin de carrera presentado como artículo al evento DX 14
description.de: AI System for Automatic Diagnosis via Possible Conflicts. Career Thesis which was presented as article to DX 14.

iterations.award: Nominated to Best Tool Paper Award

iterations.project: Characterizing and computing HBG-PCs for hybrid systems fault diagnosis

description.en: Article, application of Possible Conflicts to Hybrid Systems for its diagnose in real time.
description.es: Sistema de AI para el diagnóstico automático vía Posibles Conflictos. Proyecto fin de carrera presentado como artículo al evento DX 14
description.de: Article, application of Possible Conflicts to Hybrid Systems for its diagnose in real time.

description.en: Technical english course studied in career. Took part in two courses, one year long each one, for FCE and CAE exams.
description.de: Technical english course studied in career. Took part in two courses, one year long each one, for FCE and CAE exams.
description.es: Estudiado asignatura Inglés Técnico en universidad. Realizados dos cursos, de un año de duración, preparatorios para las pruebas FCE y CAE

description.en: Took part in four courses: A1 (Spain), A1+1, A1+2, A2+1 (Germany, Anda Sprachschule)
description.de: Took part in four courses: A1 (Spain), A1+1, A1+2, A2+1 (Germany, Anda Sprachschule)
description.es: Realizados cuatro cursos de idiomas: A1 (España), A1+1, A1+2, A2+1 (Alemania, Anda Sprachschule)
